about_the_game:
Cream war puts 6-10 players in a wild group melee, team up to cooperate, and carry out the "destruction of friendship" to the end! With quirky weapons and dazzling maps, this battle is based on hilarious physics rules. Avoid deadly traps, beat up opponents, team up with your teammates to achieve a perfect victory and go totally crazy in this party game!

"Build a fantastic team and start crazy brawl mode"

Team up with your friends or fight against other teams to win! Work closely with your partners, both locally and online, to create the perfect Brawl dream team. Fight with players across all major gaming platforms with cross-platform connectivity!

"In a brawl match, every moment is wonderful"

Defying the laws of physics, you are the king of the game yourself, using scene elements and props to trap everyone you meet, and only one person can win.

"Use crazy game items in the map"

Defeat your opponent with everything at hand! Up to 20 different weapons to choose from, from baseball bats to hair dryers to rocket launchers!

"Build your dream House and invite friends"

Go back to your cozy cottage, decorate with the furniture you've collected, and invite your friends over!

"Kawaii! I can wear something new every day!"

Dress yourself up the way you like from a multitude of costume embellishments to be the most stylish guy: from outlaw cowboys and maids to rubber jumpsuits and street suits.
detailed_description:
Communicate with us

Hello, everyone! My name is Wu, the producer of Cream War, and I am very happy to bring this game to you!
We originally planned to make a party game that was primarily based on physics, but during the design process, we found that if we just made a physics-based gameplay, it would get boring after a few repetitions-in the middle of development, we redirected the entire game!
(A special thanks to the studio cats! Thank them for calming the little emotions of every member of the team!!)
We decided to expand the content of the game, adding a lot of different gameplay on the basis of the original map, and adding a lot of items to enhance the fun level of the game - each player is the fun designer of the party
We hope this game will bring you many happy times!
If you are interested in our game and would like to cooperate with us in the next step, please contact E-mail: admin@interactef.com
